summary: Test suite for utility functions used in the Raster Vision library, verifying file handling operations (download, caching, path resolution, HTTP requests, JSON loading, local file management, directory creation, S3 interactions) and miscellaneous dictionary helpers (removing None entries and nested value assignment).
business_intent: Provide comprehensive automated tests to guarantee the correctness and robustness of file and dictionary utility components, supporting reliable data processing across various storage backends in the Raster Vision platform.
